Package ch.orwell.bogatyr.helper

Class Summary
HelperEnvInfo This class may be used to transmit client environment info to the server and to decide if an operating system corresponds to the Windows, Mac or a Unix operating system.
HelperFile This is a helper class for file system operations
HelperGeneral This is a general helper class for general problems
HelperGraphic This is a helper class for graphic operations
HelperImage This is a helper class for image operations
HelperMath This is a math helper class for math problems
HelperNet This is a helper class for network operations
HelperPdf This is a helper class for PDF operations
HelperPreferences This is a helper class for preferences
HelperSound This is a helper class for sound operations
HelperXml This is a helper class for XML operations
Paginator The Paginator splits a list in different pages
Printer This is a printer class for print operations
